System uptime.name: System uptime value measured from MaaS

Available memory.name: System available memory (free+cached+buffers) measured from MaaS

Total memory.name: System total memory measured from MaaS

Processor load (1 min average per core).name: System processor load measured from MaaS

Number of processes.name: System's total number of processes in any state measured from MaaS

Free disk space on $1.name: System's free hd disk space measured from MaaS

DSS number of active player data.name: Number of connections for players in the DSS service
